data.name: Finders Reapers - Super Crazy Character Pack
data.detailed_description:
It's time to behold the Super Crazies!



Complete your collection and show off your style!
This pack of ten characters can be used in either single-player or multiplayer modes.

Pack includes:
095. Hotty the Mascot Hotdog
040. Hop the Super Sombrero Legend
039. Smoke the crazy shooter
064. Trigger the mad cool warrior
074. Ratchet the mechanic
157. Matt the Hazmat
124. Scorch the wild Welder
131. Oxy the gasser
136. Chutes the skydiving maniac
196. Tickle the naughty Western worker

data.short_description: Enhance your gameplay with this Finders Reapers Monsters & Icons character pack. Collect all the characters, complete your collection and take them online.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Portuguese*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 780 GTX / AMD R9 290
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
